comment.author: 25738658@N05
comment._content:
Vroom, the excitement of a riding a motorcycle, captured.
Any indication of who took this photograph?

comment.author: 35128489@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/peckhamryecrow] Hi there, I'm afraid there isn't any information about who actually took the photograph, but it is from the collection of Lansbury's son-in-law Raymond Postgate, which we hold here at the Archives. I particularly like his hat in this picture!
